section.title: item source prices creating new Item Source Price
section.para: To add an Item Source Price to the list of Prices, select the ADD button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Item Source Price, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the minimum quantity of the Item you must order to receive a Price Break.
Specify the Price per unit if the Quantity Break requirements are met.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating an Item Source Price, returning you to the previous screen.
Saves the Item Source Price and adds it to the list of Item Source Prices.
